# Kable vs Flex vs qt

Here I compare a three different ways to make tables.

## `kabel`

```{r}
library(kabel)
library(kabelExtra)
kbl(mtcars, caption = "Demo table", booktabs = T) %>%
kable_styling(latex_options = c("striped", "hold_position", "scale_down")))
```

```{r child=here::here("tables", "Table_Counts.Rmd")}
```
